# GitHub Templates Version Tracker
# Last Updated: 2025-10-20
# Purpose: Track template versions across all repositories for drift detection

VERSION=1.0.0

## Issue Templates (Dual-Track Strategy)

### Web UI Forms (YAML)
ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug-report.yml=1.0.0
ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature-request.yml=1.0.0
ISSUE_TEMPLATE/documentation.yml=1.0.0
ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml=1.0.0

### CLI Templates (Markdown)
ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug-report.md=1.0.0
ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature-request.md=1.0.0
ISSUE_TEMPLATE/documentation.md=1.0.0

## Pull Request Templates
PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/default.md=1.0.0

## Usage Notes

This file tracks the canonical template versions stored in:
  ~/claude-code-tools/templates/github/

Each deployed repository should have matching versions. Use the sync script
to detect and resolve version drift:
  ~/claude-code-tools/scripts/sync-github-templates.sh

## Template Channels

- **Web Forms (.yml)**: GitHub.com web UI only, rich validation, better UX for humans
- **CLI Templates (.md)**: Used by automation (Claude Code, Codex, git-workflow-manager v0.3.0+)

## Version Format

Template versions follow the format in file comments:
  <!-- Template-Version: 1.0.0 -->
  <!-- Last-Updated: YYYY-MM-DD -->
  <!-- Channel: CLI | WEB -->
